website_summaries.verdict: A sleek and stylish, highly functional bar cabinet with plenty of storage for your stemware, wine bottles, and accessories.
pros: Can store an impressive 32 wine bottles
Diagonal shelves are removable to give you a wider range of storage options
Features a damage-resistant vinyl coated top tray
Users find it is easy to assemble
cons: Dark finish may not go with all decors

customer_reviews.title: It took 2 hours and 20 minutes for two people to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews but I just love this piece. It is exactly what I expected and wanted. The quality is good and what I was hoping for behind the doors on the bottom was that regular size bottles could fit and they do indeed. I have gallon size bottles on the sides and everything fits. It is a great piece for the price and although time consuming it all fit perfectly together. The box was extremely heavy so make sure you have two people to carry it in, it came undamaged and on time. Well worth it for the price and very happy with it overall. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Great Cabinet. Worth the Assembly Time.
customer_reviews.text: Solid cabinet - looks nice and serves its purpose well. Large drawers and cabinets are particularly valuable for a small condo - I can free up the cabinet in my kitchen that I was using for liquor. I assembled it by myself in 2.5 hours, but I would recommend using two people. The package is heavy (120 lbs) and some of the pieces are large and would be a lot easier to handle when assembling with 2 people. There are a lot of pieces and hardware but the instructions are pretty straightforward even for someone who isn't very handy - it just takes a while. A drink or 3 while assembling is suggested.
customer_reviews.author: C. Wood

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a bar area
customer_reviews.text: I really love the cabinet. It looks exactly like the picture and it is very sturdy. They could make the instructions a little easier. The biggest problem I had is that you couldn't tell for sure based on the drawings where certain things went and which direction they went. Since there was written instruction only pictures it made it very difficult. But it's an inexpensive piece of furniture, but has a high-end look.
customer_reviews.author: Carin Martin

customer_reviews.title: Everything To Love- Nothing To Hate
customer_reviews.text: Love this cabinet and definitely love the company. Item arrived with one panel cracked. Company was extremely easy to deal with and got replacement out fast. Easy to put together and looks fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: SweetestMorgan

customer_reviews.title: It looks good once it's put together but it does come in ...
customer_reviews.text: It looks good once it's put together but it does come in a million pieces, Ikea-style. Took me a couple hours to put together since I didn't have help. There were two spots that needed covering with the included matching color pen. If you look closely, you can tell, but not at a glance. Also, one of the doors doesn't hang quite straight despite many adjustments. It drags on the bottom unless I pull up slightly as I open/close it. It's not obvious when looking at it, though.
customer_reviews.author: Tasia in Oregon

customer_reviews.title: Time consuming to put together, but worth it for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I have put together a lot of furniture. This one was clearly marked, but needed to be more specific about which side was up. We followed the directions carefully and had to dismantle it at to different times to flip a board over. For those not as experienced it would be helpful if the boards were labeled better. The back is unfinished so it needs to go up against a wall. Now that it is put together, I love it. Whatever you decide, take your time putting it together and follow the instructions carefully.
customer_reviews.author: tigardbuyer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Very well built nice piece. I used gorilla wood glue in all the joints and the backing wood during assembly. Extremely solid I think adding the glue to it will make this piece last a very long time. Short of water damage causing wood to separate I don't think even moving it around will ever hurt it or cause it to get wobbly. Recommend it to everyone as soon as I finish this review I'm buying the matching tall cabinet. When bringing box inside get help it's really heavy which is a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Pay close attention to the directions
customer_reviews.text: Love this now that it is put together. Make sure you pay very close attention to the directions!!! The directions are pictures only no words. Make sure at the very beginning of the process everything is facing the correct direction. Was and hour into putting it together when I realized one piece was facing the wrong way. The cabinet is high quality and very heavy. Looks beautiful in my living room as a side mini bar.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Lovely, sturdy piece
customer_reviews.text: My somewhat handy cousin put it together with minimal assistance from me in about 3 hours. It looks great and is quite sturdy. Lots of well laid out space for bottles, glasses and accessories. I got the gray maple, and it is a very nice, neutral color that matches my gray couch and would also work with brown.
customer_reviews.author: gaelhusk

customer_reviews.title: Very, very nice
customer_reviews.text: I love this cabinet. Lower cabinets are big enough for the large wine and liquor bottles. It was very easy to put together. Warning the directions are all pictures and if you don't pay attention, you have to back up a few times. It is a surprisingly good quality. The drawers open smoothly and there were no damage marks unlike other reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Holt

customer_reviews.title: We love the product and it looks great
customer_reviews.text: I had read reviews that said the assembly was difficult. My husband and I had little if any difficulty in putting this together. That being said, it was not our first time to assemble this type of product. Had it been our first attempt at this kind of project I can imagine that it may have been a challenge. We love the product and it looks great!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and looks great
customer_reviews.text: A little challenging to assemble but looks great. Love the feature where you can remove the cross hatch dividers for the wine storage and use baskets instead.
customer_reviews.author: D. Moler

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love!! Use for my wine and liquor in the shelves and cupboards, and was able to fit tea and mugs in one drawer and stemless wine glasses in the other drawer. I store other items on top as well and this is the perfect addition to my kitchen! Perfect for wine lovers!
customer_reviews.author: Desirae

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: It took longer than expected to assemble this, but the finished product looks amazing. We use it for storage and not for a bar, it fits our space perfectly, and it is very sturdy! The piece is heavy and solid.
customer_reviews.author: Lyst83

customer_reviews.title: The real deal, this thing will last forever, and looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Heavy. Sturdy. Quality. Great drawers. Took about 2 hours to put together, hire someone for $75 on taskrabbit or serviz. Hands were sore afterward, not worth DIY. Great addition to the room.
customer_reviews.author: DKLJNB

customer_reviews.title: Great bar/liquor cabinet for the money!
customer_reviews.text: The bar cabinet is great, I love how it completes the look of my space. Pros: - Lots of space - Great Design Cons: - A Few nicks and chips but they include a final touch pen to fix those. Overall I would recommend this to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Joe C.

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Customer service was nice and helpful, great bang for your buck
customer_reviews.author: Cut42

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for a wine and liquor cabinet. It holds a lot of wine and the bottom shelves hold tall bottles and glasses. It's a nice deep espresso finish
customer_reviews.author: Fit Hot MEss

customer_reviews.title: I really liked this cabinet.  However, one of the cabinet doors was sent damaged
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this cabinet. However, one of the cabinet doors was sent damaged
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend - it gets the job done and looks sleek!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant about the material when I purchased it, but after I put it together, it’s very sturdy and has TONS of storage space. The only thing I had trouble with when assembling was how the pieces were labeled - it was hard to locate the piece names but not impossible (relied heavily on the pictures).
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Keeter

customer_reviews.title: Really nice piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: Really nice piece of furniture. A little time consuming to assemble. Would suggest two people putting this together. Fast shipment.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to assemble and looks great however the wood laminate is very cheap and scratches easy.
customer_reviews.author: BayL

customer_reviews.title: Love this bar!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love my new bar! Fits everything we need and handles do fit in the bottom cabinets. My only dislike is a few panels were a little beat up from shipping. They do provide a touch up pen for any damaged edges from shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: If you’re not good at directions, don’t attempt this
customer_reviews.text: Assembly could be easier, but it could be worse. I did do it by myself and it calls for 2 people. It looks great and lots of storage.
customer_reviews.author: Larisa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A nice little bar. Very sturdy for furniture you put together
customer_reviews.author: VRA

customer_reviews.title: Missing Parts but Well Built and Easy to Install !
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product and well built. However it was missing 2 important screws. Also one of the parts was damaged when received. I will fix the review after i see how they will handle the situation.
customer_reviews.author: Alex A

customer_reviews.title: Item nice but damaged
customer_reviews.text: The box and parts were damaged. This item was extremely heavy so even though pieces were damaged I wasn’t going to put it all back in the box and send it back. I finished putting it together and I am using it. There was no way for me to send the pics to amazon to show them.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda M

customer_reviews.title: I love love love this
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this. We use it as our dry bar. All of our guests complement it. Super classy. Just took what felt like a year to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Cassp

customer_reviews.title: 2 for 1
customer_reviews.text: We love this bar. I goes with our decor perfectly and great for an everyday coffee bar in the morning and a liquor bar at night.
customer_reviews.author: jose alvarez

customer_reviews.title: It arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: This product is poorly constructed. Very difficult to assemble and pieces were missing when we received it
customer_reviews.author: octavia collings

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: lots of pieces, but it's together now and full of wine bottles..
customer_reviews.author: Sharlene V. Lightbourne

customer_reviews.title: Building
customer_reviews.text: I lost a lot of nails and other stuff too so I couldn’t really build it well
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Chipped, crushed corners and edges!!
customer_reviews.text: 7 different areas chipped badly from bad packaging. Crushed corners and scrapped up edges. Cute design but this is very disappointing it looks very used/worn right out of the box. DONT BUY THIS!
customer_reviews.author: ashlee

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful even with chips on the wood.
customer_reviews.text: Really love this! Main complaint is that there is a couple slight chips in the pieces that it came with. BTW, make sure you buy a couple more bottles than you intend on putting in stock, with all of the assembly required.... You're going to need it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon's # 1 Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. First order was returned do to damage in shipping. Received this one with some issues to, but box from shipping was fine. Thinking it was packed damaged. Was able to work with the damage though. Pretty sturdy. If it would show up not damaged it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: John Goulet

customer_reviews.title: Functional, Nice Looking and Requires Work to Complete
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking cabinet with lots of storage. Bottom drawers are deeper than they look. It took my son about two hours to put this together and he is fairly handy, he's renovated three homes. It's a good height, almost bar height you could put food or drinks on. Made from particle board, arrived with a few chips. Overall a nice piece you can use as a bar or other storage. From the picture you can see, it looks great and is very functional. He's rate it a 4, me a 3 because not everyone would be able to put this together.
customer_reviews.author: S. Dargin

customer_reviews.title: Too many scratches when received.
customer_reviews.text: Like the style and size of the cabinet. Very unhappy with all the scratches or dings. Several spots where the black has been scratched off. Too much of a hassle to take apart, box up and send back, but we will never order again. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and I love how it looks
customer_reviews.text: It took me some time to get around to putting this together, but once I did it was quick, simple, and I love how it looks. It replaced an older version, one I had picked up at a yard sale years ago, and I am thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: Nosnivel

customer_reviews.title: Well made cabinet at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cabinet! It's very well made and has a good amount of storage at a great price. It took my husband about 1.5 hours to put together, taking his time. Shipping turnaround was quick. Although it had a damaged top, I contacted customer service, no questions asked or photos needed, they shipped a new one within a few days. Very pleased to be enjoying it!
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl

product_meta.title: South Shore Vietti Bar Cabinet with Liquor and Wine Bottle Storage with Drawers, Black Oak with Metal Handles
product_meta.description:
Bartend in Style

With plenty of room to store bottles, glasses, shakers, and mixology's accessories, this bar cabinet will be the focal point in any room. Designed with four sturdy feet, modern lines and symmetric compartments, there's so much detail in horizontal grooves of the drawers and vertical lines on the cabinet doors. You can even use the vinyl coated top to prepare drinks without worry of making a mess - it's easy to clean and damage resistant!

Useful Storage for any Purpose

Equipped to house 32 bottles of wine (2 per small square space and 6 per triangular space), there is no lack of space. You can easily store accessories in the top 2 drawers to stay neat and tidy and the bottom 2 cabinets are a great spot to keep your stemware and serving dishes. If your needs change, easily remove the diagonal shelf dividers and add baskets for a perfect console unit in the living room or by the front door.

5-Year Limited Warranty

Shop with confidence knowing that we proudly stand behind our products with a full 5-year limited warranty. Assembly is required. Please note tools and accessories are not included. Our products meet or exceed all North American safety standards. Ships in a heavy box, make sure to have a friend with you. Packaging tested and certified to reduce the risk of damage during shipment. We recommend 2 people to assemble. Made in North America with non-toxic laminated particleboard. South Shore Furniture's support team is available 7 days a week if you have any questions.
feature_bullets: ONE SIZE FITS ALL: With capacity to store up to 32 bottles of wine, there's even room for stemware and accessories to live in drawers or behind cabinet doors and even on top.
EASY TO CLEAN: With a vinyl coated top tray, don't be afraid to mix or pour drinks on top of the bar unit. Made for convenient use and and quick cleanup.
VERSATILE CABINET: Instantly transform from a bar cabinet to a storage unit by removing diagonal shelves and adding bins or baskets.
ECO-FRIENDLY: Made in North America with non-toxic laminated particleboard, this piece of furniture meets or exceeds all North American safety standards.
5-YEAR LIMITED WARRANTY: Shop with confidence knowing that we proudly stand behind our products with a full 5-year limited warranty. Please note that assembly is required.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars82 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
